title: Correction: Synergies of integrated pest and pollinator management in avocado farming in East Africa: An ex-ante economic analysis
content: by Charity Wangithi, Beatrice W. Muriithi, Gracious Diiro, Thomas Dubois, Samira Mohamed, H. Michael G. Lattorff, Benignus V. Ngowi, Elfatih M. Abdel-Rahman, Mariam Adan, Menale Kassie
author: Charity Wangithi
